# Request for Proposal – Application/Software Architect (Power Platform)

## Notice Details

* Solicitation Number: T8080-230182
* Publication Date: 2024-01-30
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-27T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 12

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Background

Transport Canada (TC) invites TBIPS SA Holders to submit a proposal for the services of an Application/Software Architect (Power Platform). The TC business units require the development of handheld and web-based applications utilizing application architecture specifications and requirements according to TC’s System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) standards and security guidelines.

## Scope of Work

The successful bidder will provide consulting services for the development of Power Apps solutions supporting multiple TC business units. The scope includes the design, development, testing, and deployment of applications in compliance with TC's standards and guidelines.

## Conditions

* One contract will be awarded for a two-year period plus one-year irrevocable option.
* The contract anticipates a start date on April 15, 2024.
* The work currently being performed by resources from different vendors under different contracts.
* Bidders must submit one bid.
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability

## Tender Documents and Attachments

Please submit one proposal (electronic or hard copy) to the Contracting Authority as described in the RFP. The required documents, including amendments, are listed in the attachments.

## Inquiries and Contact Information

Any inquiries should be directed to the Contracting Authority (Tony Youness - tony.youness@tc.gc.ca). The Contracting Authority reserves the right to negotiate with any Supplier on any procurement.

## Important Notes

* Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three times per year.
* Bidders may contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca for information on becoming a "Qualified SA Holder."
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.  There are  no downloads on the  buyandsell.gc.ca site.
